message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer on it, but I need to be within my budget.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? This is a fair price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me in the middle?
